===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=118|rad=竹|as=02|sn=8|four=88101|canj=HMM}}

The Chinese surname Zhu [[wikt:竺|竺]], which originally meant "a kind of bamboo" and was later used for "India" and "Buddhism", was adopted by many early Buddhist monks.
